name: Real Dream
description:
This game was made for the #All4myjam gamejam.

It's a roguelike with beat 'em up feel, top down. It's a guy, kinda sleeping walking around a unknown place where he woke up. You have to make sure that the caffeine level is always filled, because it will always decrease even if you dont get damaged by enemies. The number of enemies increase when you beat 30 levels.

You can control the player with WASD/Arrrows and J/Space.

#Update 1

I just edited all the sprites to be billboards and switch the camera to perspective, just for fun.
